# DO NOT EDIT THIS FILE! THIS FILE IS AUTOMATICALLY GENERATED BY xml2cmake
PROJECT(Miranda_database)

ADD_DATABASE_CODE_GEN_TARGETS(Miranda)

SET(COMMON_SOURCES
MirandaPluginInfo.C
MirandaCommonPluginInfo.C
)

SET(LIBI_SOURCES
MirandaPluginInfo.C
)

SET(LIBM_SOURCES
MirandaMDServerPluginInfo.C
${COMMON_SOURCES}
avtMirandaFileFormat.C
avtMirandaOptions.C
)

SET(LIBE_SOURCES
MirandaEnginePluginInfo.C
${COMMON_SOURCES}
avtMirandaFileFormat.C
avtMirandaOptions.C
)

INCLUDE_DIRECTORIES(
${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}
${VISIT_DATABASE_INCLUDES}
)

LINK_DIRECTORIES(${VISIT_LIBRARY_DIR} )

ADD_LIBRARY(IMirandaDatabase ${LIBI_SOURCES})
TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES(IMirandaDatabase visitcommon)
SET(INSTALLTARGETS IMirandaDatabase)

IF(NOT VISIT_ENGINE_ONLY AND NOT VISIT_DBIO_ONLY)
    ADD_LIBRARY(MMirandaDatabase ${LIBM_SOURCES})
    TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES(MMirandaDatabase visitcommon avtdbatts avtdatabase_ser )
    ADD_TARGET_DEFINITIONS(MMirandaDatabase MDSERVER)
    SET(INSTALLTARGETS ${INSTALLTARGETS} MMirandaDatabase)
ENDIF(NOT VISIT_ENGINE_ONLY AND NOT VISIT_DBIO_ONLY)

ADD_LIBRARY(EMirandaDatabase_ser ${LIBE_SOURCES})
TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES(EMirandaDatabase_ser visitcommon avtpipeline_ser avtdatabase_ser )
ADD_TARGET_DEFINITIONS(EMirandaDatabase_ser ENGINE)
SET(INSTALLTARGETS ${INSTALLTARGETS} EMirandaDatabase_ser)

IF(VISIT_PARALLEL)
    ADD_PARALLEL_LIBRARY(EMirandaDatabase_par ${LIBE_SOURCES})
    TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES(EMirandaDatabase_par visitcommon avtpipeline_par avtdatabase_par )
    ADD_TARGET_DEFINITIONS(EMirandaDatabase_par ENGINE)
    SET(INSTALLTARGETS ${INSTALLTARGETS} EMirandaDatabase_par)
ENDIF(VISIT_PARALLEL)

VISIT_INSTALL_DATABASE_PLUGINS(${INSTALLTARGETS})
VISIT_PLUGIN_TARGET_OUTPUT_DIR(databases ${INSTALLTARGETS})
VISIT_PLUGIN_TARGET_FOLDER(databases Miranda ${INSTALLTARGETS})
